name: Time Enhancements
description: Various enhancements related to time entry including support for 12 hour time entry, modern date/time pickers, and time-related action tags.

authors.name: Adam Nunez
authors.institution: UW Madison - Center for Tobacco Research and Intervention

action-tags.description: Adds a "Tomorrow" button below the date field that populates the feild with the next day.
Adds a "Next Work Day" button below the date field that populates the feild with the next week day.

project-settings.name: No configuration is needed to enter 12 hour time. All below configuration options pertain to the modern date/time picker.
